text: Rev Jayawardene Welatantrige Edwin Boteju was a Ceylonese Christian Clergyman and legislator. He was elected unofficial member of the Legislative Council of Ceylon representing the Sabaragamuwa Province in the 1921 legislative council election. ==References== Category:20th-century Sri Lankan people Category:Members of the Legislative Council of Ceylon Category:Sinhalese politicians Category:Sinhalese priests Category:Sri Lankan Anglican priests
title: W. E. Boteju
